      • getEmailTemplates

        public List<EmailTemplate> getEmailTemplates(int max,
                                    int start)
        Description copied from interface: EmailTemplateService
        Get a list of all the email templates in the system
        Specified by:
        getEmailTemplates in interface EmailTemplateService
        Parameters:
        max - limit the number of items returned (0 for all)
        start - start with this item (0 for the first one)
        Returns:
        a list of templates

      • getRenderedTemplate

        public RenderedTemplate getRenderedTemplate(String key,
                                   Locale locale,
                                   Map<String,String> replacementValues)
        Description copied from interface: EmailTemplateService
        Get a rendered Template in the specied locale
        Specified by:
        getRenderedTemplate in interface EmailTemplateService
        Parameters:
        key - the template key which identifies a template
        locale - the locale for the template
        replacementValues - a set of replacement values which are in the map like so:
        key => value (String => String)
        username => aaronz
        course_title => Math 1001 Differential Equations
        Returns:
        the processed template

      • getRenderedTemplateForUser

        public RenderedTemplate getRenderedTemplateForUser(String key,
                                          String userReference,
                                          Map<String,String> replacementValues)
        Description copied from interface: EmailTemplateService
        Get a template in the appropriate locale for a user - is the user has no preferred locale set the system default will be used
        Specified by:
        getRenderedTemplateForUser in interface EmailTemplateService
        Parameters:
        key - the template key which identifies a template
        userReference - the unique reference for a user (e.g. /user/aaronz)
        replacementValues - a set of replacement values which are in the map like so:
        key => value (String => String)
        username => aaronz
        course_title => Math 1001 Differential Equations
        Returns:
        the processed template

      • processEmailTemplates

        public void processEmailTemplates(List<String> templatePaths)
        Description copied from interface: EmailTemplateService
        Takes the list of paths supplied and looks up the XML files using the services classloader. Each file is parsed into an EmailTemplate and saved.
        Specified by:
        processEmailTemplates in interface EmailTemplateService
        Parameters:
        templatePaths - A List of template path Strings
